select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
,
from bet_matchbk
order by ${orderByClause}

select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from bet_matchbk
order by ${orderByClause}

select
from bet_matchbk where 1=1
and mid LIKE CONCAT('%',#{mid},'%')
order by id desc limit #{pageNum},10

select count(*) from bet_matchbk where 1=1
and mid LIKE CONCAT('%',#{mid},'%')
